name: Kallio Lounge Chair
details: An iconic piece of modern design. The Kallio Lounge Chair is crafted from premium oak and supple leather, offering unparalleled comfort and timeless style. A true centerpiece for any living space.

name: Aino Dining Chair
details: With its minimalist aesthetic and ergonomic design, the Aino Dining Chair combines form and function. Made from solid birch, it's built to last for generations.

name: Sculptural Armchair
details: A statement piece that blurs the line between furniture and art. This armchair's flowing lines and plush upholstery invite you to relax in style.

name: Modular Sectional Sofa
details: Create your perfect seating arrangement with our versatile modular sofa. Each piece is designed for comfort and flexibility, upholstered in a durable, family-friendly fabric.

name: Solid Oak Coffee Table
details: A robust and elegant coffee table, crafted from sustainably sourced solid oak. Its simple, clean lines will complement any living room decor.

name: Marble Dining Table
details: Dine in luxury with this stunning marble-topped dining table. The solid steel base provides a modern contrast to the classic, elegant marble. Seats up to six.

name: Dome Pendant Light
details: This minimalist dome pendant provides a warm, focused light, perfect for hanging over a dining table or kitchen island. Available in matte finishes.

name: Arc Floor Lamp
details: An elegant and adjustable arc floor lamp that provides overhead lighting without the need for ceiling suspension. Features a heavy marble base for stability.
